sentences.sContent: Most investments are expected to appreciate at a steady rate.
sentences.sCn: 大多数投资都应该会平稳增值。

remMethod.val: ap + preci(价值) + ate → 给以价值 → 重视

words.tran: 感激的；赏识的；有欣赏力的；承认有价值的

trans.tranOther: to gradually become more valuable over a period of time

trans.tranCn: 重视；为…表示感激；意识到
trans.tranOther: used to thank someone in a polite way or to say that you are grateful for something they have done
